summary: The diff implements comprehensive error handling infrastructure and defensive coding patterns for startup failures. All four requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-4) are addressed with error boundaries, startup failure handlers, router initialization safeguards, and environment configuration utilities. The changes include enhanced AppErrorBoundary with external error support, CrashFallbackScreen with detailed error display and reload functionality, defensive router initialization with null checks and fallback UI, unhandled promise rejection handlers, Internet Identity provider URL resolution shim, and improved branch authentication with localStorage error handling.
